text: A pillar is another word for a column, which is a vertical support structure in architecture. Pillar may also mean: * Pillar (band), a rock band * Pillar (Lake District), a fell in the English Lake District * A door pillar on a car * Paul Pillar, retired CIA National Intelligence Officer (publicly criticized Bush administration) *City Pillars, South African football (soccer) club ==Related pages== * Wikipedia:Five pillars
title: Pillar
